trans-unit.source: Specifies the editing mode for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />
trans-unit.target: Especifica o modo de edição para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> properties use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> to specify how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> behaves when it receives input from a tablet pen.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> uso de propriedades de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> para especificar como o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> se comporta quando ele recebe entrada de caneta eletrônica.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to allow users to partially erase strokes with the inverted tip of a stylus.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como permitir que os usuários parcialmente apagar traços com a dica invertido de uma caneta.

trans-unit.source: An elliptical cursor appears on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> when the user erases ink.
trans-unit.target: Um cursor elíptico aparece na <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> quando o usuário apaga tinta.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the pen erases part of a stroke when the pen intersects the stroke.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a caneta apaga parte de um traço quando ela cruza o traço.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the pen erases an entire stroke when the pen intersects the stroke.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a caneta apaga um traço inteiro quando ela cruza o traço.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> responds to gestures, and does not receive ink.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> responde a gestos e não recebe tinta.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that ink appears on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> when the pen sends data to it.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a tinta aparece no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> quando a caneta envia dados para ele.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> responds to gestures, and receives ink.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> responde a gestos e recebe tinta.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no action is taken when the pen sends data to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica que nenhuma ação é realizada quando a caneta envia dados para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the pen selects strokes and elements on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a caneta seleciona traços e elementos no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
